title: There  seems to be a lot of people who miss dominion...
body:
So let's try and fix it together.

Dominion is still available in custom modes. 
My idea to help co-ordinate this is to start a chat room titled "Dominion".
If people auto-join it on start up, whenever you're up for a game just check, and see if you can get 10 people.

If you guys like, there could be a specific day where we get everyone on.

Any ideas slash feedback just post :D.

replies.body:
Dominons should have already been implemented into the game options we can choose. It was out WAY before ARAMS. Biggest thing I miss from transferring from NA server to OCE was not being able to play Dominions. Arams are good, but not being able to choose your champion (while not having to do a normal or ranked to do this) is a pain. 

 Dominions, (and I played over 1000 of them on NA) were fun, and even though enemies could choose whatever champs they wanted, it was a good learning curve to try to counter them. Specially bot lane. I did 50 jayce games in a row and always had teemos at bot. but learn't to counter. 

Bring the Dominons back please, So much fun. But I am up for the custom game idea. Only problem is hard to get people to join

Here's the way I see it; 
1. Either they're aren't enough people interested and Riot are justified in not opening the queues yet. 
2. There are enough people and this idea will work. 

Try to spread it to your friends and get them to auto join on start up. 

Also I think they're decision to release ARAM over Dom was based on queue popularity in other regions.
Trying to create a Dominion game is the worst coz you wait 30 minuets just to see 5 people join and leave the lobby.

That's why I'm hoping to coordinate some more.
Anyone interested should join the group.
If you see a few people free we could try and start on, or we can set specific times, "Like hey anyone want to be on 7 tonight to play"

I see a lot of people complaining about lack of Dominion, this is a way they can all be in contact and oragnise games among themselves.
Hard to miss Dominion after playing Ascension. That was a more improved version.

Yes.

edit: Riot removed my name 'Dominion' sad times.

Lol your  summoner name was Dominion, that's pretty cool!

Add the group if you want to play some games.

Agreed, i used to play the hell out of dominion when i was back on NA - was a good way to play a quick competitive game on a champion i want to learn and actively fight on without having to give it too much thought or risk losing 30+ mins of my life.

+1

Please feel free to add the group in  the client. 
No many have, but I'm hoping to make a new post a spread the word.
